text: Hey folks, this is a simple thing. I was trying to write a little Makefile for building a Weave file. I can never remember the commands and options, etc. :slightly_smiling_face:. So using ubuntu linux, I need to call Julia from the command line, then load Weave, and then run the `weave(filename, out_path:pwd)` command. I can't remember the correct syntax for running like multiple julia commands from the command line. Isn't it something like `julia {using Weave; weave(...)}` or something.
